author: MKratt
post_text: July 23, 2015 at 9:46â€¯PM#1Hi everyone,I'm currently working with a show that is transferring from one city to another for yet another season. This time some of the lighting equipment have changed, although the cloning part of it have worked out without any certain issues.What I am looking into now is all the Position Presets. I would like to tidy my palettes up a bit and was wondering if there is a way to see if a Position Preset is used in my particular "Show" Sequence? If not I would like to delete them.Another question regarding the sequence referencing, is there a way to figure out if some fixtures in a certain Position Preset are not used/referenced in my "Show" Sequence and therefore can be taken out of that particular Preset?Best regards,Michael
title: Preset and Sequence references
